feat.value: Transcribed by Stephen Emmel in Naples in April 2005; transcription proofed by Stephen Emmel July 3 2010 ; transcription does not record spaces and paleographic rendition of letters other than ekthetics. David Brakke and Andrew Crislip published a translation of I See Your Eagerness in their book Selected Discourses of Shenoute the Great (Cambridge University Press, 2015) pp. 91-92.
